Text: This game is pretty short only 5 levels and 3 weapons - M4A1, Sniper Rifle, LAW took me an hour to beat.
what is activation key can any one tell me pleassssssee

It's only good to play once considering the game length and content, there's no multiplayer or DLC. It was only sold for $10 so don't expect much. Supposedly made in under 6 months too. You can tell it's not a retail game when you play it.
You don't use a key you copy the skidrow stuff into your installation folder - it's on the ISO

Worked well with my version of Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit, if you trust the uploader make sure your AV is off so it doesn't snag the Paul.dll file, if it quarantines this file the game won't work.
